definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The physical and chemical properties of the carbon black are detected, and its microstructure is analysed by High Revolution Electromicroscopy (HREM) and X-ray Diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 射線衍射和高分辨率透射電鏡分析了樣品的微觀結構。

sentences.english: Nuclear condensation or apoptotic body in the apoptotic cells were observed under transmission electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 透射電鏡下可見凋亡細胞的核固縮或凋亡小體。

sentences.english: The fine structure of the gill in Pangasius sutchi has been investigated using transmission and scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 對蘇氏鮎鰓結構進行掃描和透射電鏡觀察。

sentences.english: The porous nickel was fabricated by using the jet electrodeposition.
sentences.chinese: 採用噴射電沉積方法制備塊體多孔鎳。

sentences.english: Penicillin production of the transformant was analyzed by bioassays and the microbodies were observed by transmission electron microscope(TEM).
sentences.chinese: 同時通過透射電鏡觀察了菌體中微體數量的變化。

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of Scnedesmus obliquus were studied by transmission electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 透射電鏡觀察了斜生柵藻的細胞超微結構。

sentences.english: The specimens were prepared with hot agar centrifugation for ultra-thin sections and observed with transmission electron microscopy(TEM).
sentences.chinese: 熱瓊脂離心法制備電鏡樣品，透射電鏡觀察。

sentences.english: Aggregation of high-density particles was observed by transmission electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 透射電鏡觀察可見胞質內高密度物質聚集。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the ultra-structure changes in protoscolex cells were observed by means of electron transmission microscopy(TEM).
sentences.chinese: 在透射電鏡下觀察原頭節細胞超微結構的變化。

sentences.english: The electron microscope was used to study the histomorphologic changes of myelin sheath in VTA.
sentences.chinese: 應用透射電鏡對各組大鼠VTA的髓鞘進行觀察。

sentences.english: Using data of solar flares and radio bursts of type 1V, the flares corresponding to the storms have been identified.
sentences.chinese: 利用耀斑和1V型射電暴等資料證認出對應的耀斑。

sentences.english: Quasar is short for quasi-stellar radio source.
sentences.chinese: 類星體是“類似恆星射電源”的縮寫。

sentences.english: The pileus ultrastructure of Pleurotus ostreatus was investigated with transmission electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 利用透射電鏡，對平菇菌蓋的超微結構進行了觀察。

sentences.english: The changes of ultrastructure of ectopic endometrium tissue were observed by transmission electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 透射電鏡觀察異位子宮內膜組織超微結構改變。

sentences.english: The ultrustracture of the liver of the Chinese giant salamander, Andrias davidianus (Blanchard) was studied with transmission electron microscopy (TEM).
sentences.chinese: 應用透射電鏡對中國大鯢的肝臟進行了超微結構研究。

sentences.english: In addition, a network structure of the BDM was observed using transmission electron microscopy(TEM).
sentences.chinese: 雙藥膠束用透射電鏡觀察，發現了一種網狀結構。
